attributes.action: Lower duty on fuel by at least 35% and bring it back to an acceptable level
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want fuel duty cut by at least 35%. 
We struggle to cope with the ever increasing cost of fuel. We all need fuel to go about our daily lives and the cost of fuel (amongst other things) is far too high. We find ourselves struggling to make ends meet.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=fuel+duty&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=audit+bank&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
